<line: 4> AO 440 (Rev. 06/12) Summons in a Civil Action

[TITLE]
<line: 6> UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
<line: 7> for the
<line: 8> Eastern District of North Carolina
<line: 9> IN RE: ZIMMER NEXGEN KNEE
<line: 10> IMPLANTS PRODUCTS LIABILITY LITIGATION
<line: 11> This applies to:.
<line: 12> JO ANNE SINGLETARY ROGERS;
<line: 13> Plaintiff(s)
<line: 14> v.
<line: 15> Civil Action No. 7:16-CV-368 -H
<line: 16> ZIMMER, INC., ZIMMER HOLDINGS, INC., et al.
<line: 17> Defendant(s)

[TITLE]
<line: 19> SUMMONS IN A CIVIL ACTION

[TEXT]
<line: 21> To: (Defendant's name and address) Zirmmer, Inc.
<line: 22> 345 East Main Street, Suite 400
<line: 23> Warsaw, IN 46580

[TEXT]
<line: 25> A lawsuit has been filed against you.

[TEXT]
<line: 27> Within 21 days after service of this summons on you (not counting the day you received it) -- or 60 days if you
<line: 28> are the United States or a United States agency, or an officer or employee of the United States described in Fed. R. Civ.
<line: 29> P. 12 (a)(2) or (3) - you must serve on the plaintiff an answer to the attached complaint or a motion under Rule 12 of
<line: 30> the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure. The answer or motion must be served on the plaintiff or plaintiff's attorney,
<line: 31> whose name and address are: H. Clay Hodges.

[TEXT]

[TEXT]
<line: 34> Harris Sarratt & Hodges, LLP
<line: 35> 1620 Hillsborough Street, Suite 200
<line: 36> Raleigh, NC 27605

[TEXT]
<line: 38> If you fail to respond, judgment by default will be entered against you for the relief demanded in the complaint.
<line: 39> You also must file your answer or motion with the court..

[ABANDON]
<line: 41> JULIE RICHARDS JOHNSTON,
<line: 42> CLERK OF COURT
<line: 43> form Ruoh, hpnty
<line: 44> Signature of Clerk or Deputy Clerk

[TEXT]
<line: 46> Date: _10/31/2016

[TEXT]
<line: 12> This summons for (name of individual and title, if any).
<line: 13> was received by me on (date)

[TEXT]
<line: 15>  I personally served the summons on the individual at (place).
<line: 16> on (date)
<line: 17> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 19>  I left the summons at the individual's residence or usual place of abode with (name)
<line: 20>  a person of suitable age and discretion who resides there,.
<line: 21>  on (date)
<line: 22> , and mailed a copy to the individual's last known address; or.

[TEXT]
<line: 24>  I served the summons on (name of individual).
<line: 25> , who is
<line: 26> designated by law to accept service of process on behalf of (name of organization).
<line: 27> on (date)
<line: 28> ; or

[TEXT]
<line: 30>  I returned the summons unexecuted because
<line: 31> ; or
<line: 32>  Other (specify):

[TEXT]
<line: 34> My fees are $
<line: 35> for travel and $
<line: 36> for services, for a total of $
<line: 37> 0.00
